sentence.Network_en: We had stupidly been looking at the wrong column of figures.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们稀里糊涂，看串了数字栏。

sentence.Network_en: See how stupidly they kow-tow to persons higher in the hierarchy.
sentence.Network_cn: 瞧他们对上级唯命是从的样子是多么愚蠢啊。

sentence.Network_en: He got rather drunk and behaved stupidly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他喝得烂醉，失态出丑了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... stupidity 愚蠢 stupidly 愚蠢地 stupor 昏迷.
She stared at him stupidly ., 她呆呆地瞪着他.
He stared at the beautiful girl stupidly , his mouth wide open ., 他傻乎乎地瞪着那美丽的姑娘看 , 嘴巴张得大大地.
Don ' t talk stupidly , or else others will laugh at you ., 别总说蠢话 , 会被人家笑话的.

list.abs: Slang , at its worst , it is stupidly coarse and provocative ., 俗语 , 往最坏说是愚蠢的粗俗和挑衅.
Don ' t talk stupidly , or else others will laugh at you ., 别总说蠢话 , 会被人家笑话的.
呆呆用英语怎么说... ... Don't be a sap. 别那么呆头呆脑的。 look with amazement;look stupidly. 惊异的看；呆呆的看。.
Mr Obama had said that although he didn't know the facts about the arrest of Mr Gates disorderly conduct at his home , the police had " acted stupidly " .奥巴马说，虽然他不知道关于盖茨被捕的事实是因为在自己家里的行为失当，但是警察“行为愚蠢”。

entry.tran: 糊涂的;头脑迟钝的;愚蠢的
entry.def: If you say that someone or something is stupid, you mean that they show a lack of good judgment or intelligence and they are not at all sensible.

example.ex: I'll never do anything so stupid again...
example.tran: 我再也不会做这种傻事了。

entry.tran: 讨厌的;恼人的;无足轻重的
entry.def: You say that something is stupid to indicate that you do not like it or care about it, or that it annoys you.

example.ex: I wouldn't call it art. It's just stupid and tasteless...
example.tran: 我不认为这是艺术。它简直无聊透顶，毫无品位。

example.ex: Friendship is much more important to me than a stupid old ring!
example.tran: 友谊对我来说可比一个破戒指重要得多！

sentences.sentence: "he had stupidly bought a one way ticket"

auth_sentence.content: I think the BBC has behaved badly and stupidly.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think the BBC has behaved badly and stupidly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think the BBC has behaved badly and stupidly.

auth_sentence.content: If Iceland behaved recklessly, Britain behaved stupidly.
auth_sentence.res_content: If Iceland behaved recklessly, Britain behaved stupidly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If Iceland behaved recklessly, Britain behaved stupidly.

auth_sentence.content: This is not the only stupidly long show out there.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is not the only stupidly long show out there.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not the only stupidly long show out there.

sentences.en: How can you teach a child who just grins stupidly at you all day?
sentences.cn: 如果一个孩子整天都冲着你傻笑,你怎么能教他呢?

sentences.en: I once stupidly asked him why he smiled so often.
sentences.cn: 我曾经愚蠢地问他为什么老是微笑。
